Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Moten
Reviews.Content: I love the camera!!! It does everything I need it to do and more. It takes great action photos and video. Once ordered it came quick and as advertised by the seller. I would purchase from this seller again.

ProductInfo.Features:
